post_content:
One FS. Price is net to me and delivered. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

PSA 2.5 Lord. Tougher to find common (check out what’s available on eBay presently). A rock solid card. New flip. $105.  

Thanks for looking!
